name: Compose!!!
description:
DISCLAIMER: 

*The score system is too punitive (scores are about 20% lower than they should be), this is going to be fixed in the next build*

 The game:

 Compose is a rhytm-platformer hybrid game set in the World of Music. Hop around and collect notes to save Music!

 Magical girl: 

Melody is a girl who loves music. She often daydreams while listening to music. In her mind she is the Mage of Songs and everything she touches becomes music. It's her job to protect the World of Music.
